A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Well.  Honest initial reaction straight from the cinema\, first viewing...

#TheLastJedi gets a lot right but plenty wrong too.  Some baffling decisions made story wise.  Some bits that were just plain bonkers.  It also has some absolutely magical moments but overall it doesn't work.

A script more concerned about shocking the audience than serving the story and characters set up in TFA.  I'm disappointed because I'd convinced myself that @rianjohnson would absolutely nail it.  He didn't.
